name: Space Savior (Tomi_Ohl)
description:
2D Shooter Assignment for the "Game Design and Development 1" course.

My modifications:

  • Turbo Mode: player will move faster (toggle via the button X)
  • health powerup (in the form of a bolt)
  • new destroyable asteroid with custom skin
  • remaining lives displayed in percentages
  • level 2 & 3 design
  • new name, menu background
  • instructions page with instructions

Credits:

  • Brian Winn
  • Tomáš Öhlsläger
